alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Claiborne, central Jefferson and western Copiah Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 747 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lorman, or near Fayette, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pattison and Blue Hill around 805 AM CDT. Peyton and Mcbride around 810 AM CDT. Hermanville around 815 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for central and southwestern Mississippi. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until noon CDT for south central Mississippi.
